DOC.brief_summary: This study focus pathophysiology underlie association exposure particulate pollutant risk for/response viral infection . The investigator hypothesize exposure wood smoke particle ( WSP ) enhance influenza virus-induced granulocyte NK cell activation , via hyaluronic acid-mediated effect IFNg production . Oxidant stress viral replication may also affect . As NIH fund ViCTER project , purpose study also test novel assay granulocyte activation ( Doershuk lab ) lipid mediator activation ( Albritton lab ) previously use type research . Healthy , nonsmoking adult age 18-40 year recruit . This randomized , placebo control study compare NLF granulocyte response LAIV administer either WSP clean air , normal healthy volunteer . Subjects receive either WSP placebo ( clean air ) , follow standardize dose LAIV serial post-infection sample nasal lavage fluid , nasal biopsy blood
DOC.brief_title: Effects Wood Smoke Particles Influenza-induced Nasal Inflammation Normal Volunteers
DOC.criteria: 1 . Normal lung function , define ( Knudson 1976/1984 predict set ) : FVC > 75 % predicted gender , ethnicity , age height ; FEV1 > 75 % predict ; FEV1/FVC ratio > 0.70 < 0.90 . 2 . Oxygen saturation > 94 % 3 . Normal blood pressure ( Systolic 140 90 , Diastolic 9060 mm Hg ) 4 . Symptom Score great 6 ( possible 39 ) total symptom score 5 . On day challenge , body temperature must great 37.8 degree , measure orally 1 . A history significant chronic illness ( include diabetes , autoimmune disease , immunodeficiency state , know ischemic heart disease , chronic respiratory disease chronic obstructive pulmonary disease asthma , hypertension ) 2 . Positive pregnancy test within 48 hour time challenge 3 . Use inhaled substance ( medical recreational purpose ) . Nonsmokers must abstinent smoke prior 12 month , smoke 1 pack course previous year smoke 1 week prior entrance study . 4 . Receipt LAIV current season 5 . History allergy egg 6 . Acute , nonchronic , medical condition , include ( limited ) pneumonia bronchitis require antibiotic , febrile illness , flulike symptom must totally resolve symptomatically 3 week 7 . Unspecified illness , judgment investigator increase risk associate experimental LAIV infection , basis exclusion . 8 . Expected exposure subject immunocompromised individual ( infect LAIV ) 3 week follow LAIV inoculation
